text: The Guatemala women's national handball team is the national team of Guatemala. It is governed by the Federation National de Balomano de Guatemala and takes part in international handball competitions. ==Results== ===Pan American Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- | 2003 ||7th place match||7th||4||0||0||4||48||140 |- | 2015 ||11th place match||12th||7||0||0||7||101||277 |- | 2017 ||9th place match||10th||5||0||0||5||91||173 |} ===Central American and Caribbean Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |align=left| 2018 Barranquilla |5th place game |5th |5 |2 |0 |3 |94 |140 |} ===Central American Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- style="background:gold;" | 2017 ||gold medal match||1st||5||5||0||0||117||85 |} ===Central American Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- style="background:gold;" | 2014 ||round robin||1st||4||4||0||0||111||68 |- style="background:gold;" | 2016 ||round robin||1st||4||4||0||0||138||58 |} ===Pan American Games qualification tournaments=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- | 2019 ||round robin||4th||3||0||0||3||51||97 |} ==External links== *IHF profile Category:Women's national handball teams Handball National team
